prompt: Query the SQLite database to find the top 3 products by total revenue from delivered orders (sum of order totals where status = 'delivered', grouped by product name, sorted descending). Then post the results as a message to the #general Slack channel (C001) listing each product name and its total delivered revenue. When done, report the top 3 products with their revenue figures and the Slack message ID.
gold_response: Top 3 products by delivered revenue: 1) Standing Desk — $499.99; 2) Ergonomic Chair — $389.99; 3) Mechanical Keyboard — $149.99. Posted these results to #general (C001) and received a message ID.

rubric.criteria: The agent queried SQLite joining orders and products, filtered for status='delivered', and correctly identified the top 3 products: Standing Desk ($499.99), Ergonomic Chair ($389.99), and Mechanical Keyboard ($149.99) in that order.
The agent posted the top-3 product revenue results to the #general Slack channel (C001).
The agent reported the Slack message ID returned from the post operation.
